location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map of the route from Bunder Abbas to Cape Jask. 1864'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:537 x 442 mm; on sheet 572 x 497 mmFoliation:The map sheet has been foliated in the front top right hand corner of the folio with a pencil number enclosed in a circle.

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Below title the note: Protracted by Mr [Edwin] Dawes, late Indian Navy, to accompany Colonel Pelly's despatch No.73 of 1864.Shows the line of route with distances ‘calculated from the time actually employed in marching’. Districts labelled for reference with settlements and forts indicated by symbols; shoals represented by dots and crosses with anchorage marked.
